title: Grave Stones - Instead of Emotes
body:
So I saw the preview for the emotes and I am not keen on these. More cartoony spam marks to taunt with. 

I thought "What could be a better option for Riot to make money?" And I thought of Grave Stones. 
You are bound to die at some point (unless you are REALLY good), so why not have a little fun with your death?

http://i.imgur.com/OEpRHPW.png

I drew some examples. I'm sure you can use your imagination. When you die your body fades or whatever and is replaced with a Grave Stone.
